citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
An attempted inspection was made on 4/7/14 at 12: 30 pm but no one was home. Licensee was reached by phone
but was out of town. A responsible adult shall be made available to accompany APHIS officials during the inspection
process.
